## MongoDBRepository.findOneByFields() method

Find one doc by specifics fields

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findOneByFields(fields: Fields, options?: Options): Promise<IDocumentResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | Fields | The fields to match |
|  options | Options | <i>(Optional)</i> Data source options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;IDocumentResult&gt;
